pkgmetadata.longdescription: Helper Functions for Point Pattern Analysis // Growing collection of helper functions for point pattern analysis. Most functions are designed to work with the 'spatstat' (http://spatstat.org) package. The focus of most functions are either null models or summary functions for spatial point patterns. For a detailed description of all null models and summary functions, see Wiegand and Moloney (2014, ISBN:9781420082548).
